name: AdvancedWallClimb
shortDescription: Allows platformer characters to wall jumping, climb walls and adds gravity based wall sliding.
description: This extension has everything you NEED to add those Celeste Mechanics into your platformer game.
Wall Jump, Climb Walls with Customizable options, like auto climb, press onces to climb, and hold to climb!
With additional features, like: Auto Jumping on Ledge corners or disable and add your own custom logic!
This tool works well with enabling ledge grabbing from the default platformer character behavior if auto-jumping is disabled.

eventsFunctions.description: Define javascript classes.
eventsFunctions.name: DefineJavascriptClasses

eventsFunctions.description: Get the names of all climbable objects in array format.
eventsFunctions.name: GetClimbableNames

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows platformer characters to wall jump, climb walls and adds gravity based wall sliding.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AdvancedWallClimb

eventsFunctions.name: ControlPressedOrSimulated

eventsFunctions.description:
De/activate the use of default controls.
If deactivated, use the simulated actions to move the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetDefaultControls
eventsFunctions.sentence: Ignore the default climb controls for _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: Wall jump time span

propertyDescriptors.name: TimeToJump

propertyDescriptors.label: Point has to be inside climbable before climb key is pressed
propertyDescriptors.description: This is only used if "Keep holding to climb" is the climb type.
propertyDescriptors.name: BeforeClimbCollide

propertyDescriptors.label: Maximum climb duration (in seconds)
propertyDescriptors.description: Input -1 to apply no limit. Use the action "Reset climb duration" (When the object is on floor for example) to reset the timer.
propertyDescriptors.name: MaximumClimbDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Has to be moving toward climbable to climb
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveIntent
